page.title: 20SPARE TIME ACTIVITIES
page.content:
In my spare time I watch T.V. I like watching childrens I.T.V., or I play with my lego. In my mum's spare time she sits down to rest after doing the house work. In my dad's spare time he sits down and reads a book or goes bird watching. In my brother's spare time he reads comics or plays football.
This record has been compiled by class Junior 3 (10 year olds), of Leven School. The individual contributors were; Neil Cottee, Emma Craven, Ian & Lee Fernie, Amanda Hobson, Sarah Lister,Mark Lovewell, Matthew Moody, Sara Nixon, Kristian Rowland,Mr.R.J. Richardson, Sally-Anne Roydhouse,Andrew Tindall,Frances Thorpe,Sarah Waudby,Mr.T.Whinham, Mrs.E.L.Wright.
